headline: Coinbase Adds DEX Trading: Can it Unlock Millions of On-Chain Assets?
summary: Coinbase's new DEX trading on its main app lets U.S. users tap millions of on-chain assets within moments of creation.

headline: MicroStrategy Stock Rises Amid Crypto Rally. It Bought a Lot Less Bitcoin Than Usual.
summary: Crypto stocks were racking up gains on Monday, boosted by a  Bitcoin  price surge and a slew of positive regulatory developments.  Shares of  MicroStrategy  —the largest corporate Bitcoin holder—were up 3% to $406.82 in early trading.  The company disclosed on Monday that it bought 155 Bitcoins last week, at an average price of $116,401.

headline: Paramount, Tesla, crypto stocks: Trending Tickers
summary: Paramount (PARA) stock is in focus after the company announced a $7.7 billion deal with TKO Group to stream UFC events. Tesla (TSLA) applied for a license to supply electricity in the UK, even as its electric vehicle (EV) sales in the region slump. Crypto stocks like Coinbase (COIN), Robinhood (HOOD), and Strategy (MSTR) are rallying after a surge in bitcoin (BTC-USD) prices. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Morning Brief.

headline: Crypto Stocks Gain as Bitcoin Trades Near Its All-Time High
summary: Shares of Strategy, the largest corporate holder of bitcoin, trading platforms Coinbase and Robinhood Markets, and other firms connected to the cryptocurrency market advanced Monday as the price of bitcoin hovered near its all-time high.

headline: Do You Believe in the Upside Growth Potential of Robinhood Markets (HOOD)?
summary: Springview Capital Management, an investment management company, released its second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the same can be downloaded here. Limited partners returned +17.8% in the second quarter, bringing the year-to-date return to +15.7% compared to the S&P 500’s +10.9% return in the quarter and +6.2% in the first half, including dividends. For […]
